website_summaries.verdict: Powerful pressure washer offers unparalleled versatility.
pros: This model is designed to be used vertically or horizontally for maximum convenience
Includes quick connectors, compact design, soap dispenser and hose reel
cons: Not as powerful as other models

customer_reviews.title: Painting with water
customer_reviews.text: Finally tried it out this weekend on some nasty looking vinyl siding. It's like painting with water - worked great!! Easy to put together, light, compact and enough power. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Graybosch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Although great a price for a 1500 psi pressure washer. You want to steer clear of this product. I was hoping for this pressure washer to last longer than 6 weeks. Unfortunately, it is toast. I understand the concept of having its own dedicated GFI and reset around surrounding water, but here is where the issues start. Was working fine yesterday, go to plug and turn on today and the relay reset will not function properly. I should not have to take the time to bypass the reset, being this is a brand new product! Ridiculous. Will be staying away from Greenworks products from now on... Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Roan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pressure Washer for its Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 8 months ago to wash my new 2016 Lexus IS300 F Sport. Haven't had any issues with it with multiple washes and works great with my Chemical Guys foam lance. You'll definitely get a great wash for your car with this guy.
customer_reviews.author: alex zwick

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product with worthless support, you just wait on hold forever.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great 4 times and then it just quit and the GFI won't reset. If it would last a year I'd consider it alright, but less than 6 hours of use until failure is unacceptable. I've been on the phone WAITING on technical support for over 30 minutes, now that I got through, it took multiple calls on 3 different days just to do that. So to sum it up, crappy product with non-existent support.
customer_reviews.author: C. Enlow

customer_reviews.title: Worked 3 times
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times, now will not turn on. Motor burned up. Obviously low quality. Started making weird noise, and smelled like burnt electrical wires. Yes, I bled the water before turning on. Yes, I reset the breaker. It is amazing to me that people sell such low quality items. When it did work, the pressure was not impressive. Do not buy this item. If you do, make sure you use it 3 times within 30 days so you can return it when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Why pay someone over $100 when this is cheaper and​ can be used multiple times? I don't think our house had ever been power washed prior to us purchasing it but Greenworks delivered again. Easily blasted the mossy mildew right off of our siding and brick. I then tackled our porch and driveway and was pleasantly surprised how easy it cleaned right up. The great pricing and ease of use has my garage filling up with Greenworks products. Mower, trimmer, hedger and now pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Good value pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this pressure washer, especially for the price. I bought it to get some mold off of our siding, but my husband has enjoyed using it so much he has worked on our driveway, made our fence look new, and cleaned his Jeep tires. He is interested in buying more nozzles. So far, we are happy with this pressure washer!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sara

customer_reviews.title: affordable power washer.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product works very well for what I needed it for which would be cleaning my deck off. Here's a heads up if you want this power washer to work well each and every time you have to make sure before you even start it with the power off the hose hooked up and the water on squeeze the trigger and hold it until all the air is out of the system or you will burn the unit up the pump will not work, there's no reset for this the damage is done so if you can't remember this write a note and put it on it and enjoy your product.
customer_reviews.author: Gordo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Really unimpressed. It works for 30-90 seconds then quits. I’ve tried taking the whole thing apart, plugging it into different power outlets, used a different hose, cleaned out the nozzles, and read the instruction manual front to back. I also called the help line but they don’t have Saturday hours! How does that make sense? I can’t imagine many people are using the pressure washer M-F 8-5 like their business hours for their help line. As of right now my plan is to return this junk. What a waste of time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Opened and Used Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for small scale cleaning like walkway or patio . The only complain I have is that it was used by somebody and cleaned with car wax and repackaged . It had water marks on the hose and power washer handle . The electric cable was wrapped around like it has been used and customer returned it for some reason. The product runs fine but , it is listed as brand new on the website but water spots on the item says otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Dalvi

customer_reviews.title: Ehh just okay. --- update = Awful
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as i expected but works to foam my car with the car wash foam tool. I don’t think this would clean moldy siding from more then 4 inches away. Update --- only the second time using it and the hand held "gun" part of this is leaking at its seam making this broken after a total of 45 minutes of use. Terrible ... Do not recommend for anyone to buy for any reason. I will update when picture soon
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Renner

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to have this, finally I could clean my siding, my deck, and all those other icky places that needs a little more umph than a garden hose. After finally finding a free day to put this together and use it, unfortunately it was a total dud. Started for one minute then nothing. Would have loved for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C

customer_reviews.title: Proper Expectations
customer_reviews.text: If you purchase this with the correct expectations, you’ll be pleased. It’s advertised as a 1500 PSI unit and that’s just not true. I would say closer to 750-1000 PSI. Perfect for washing cars but not as powerful as others I have used in this class. If you’re looking to blast grime off a sidewalk, you might want look for something else. If you want something easy to wash cars, this is a good option. I’m not sure I’m going to keep it yet since I really was hoping for 1500 PSI.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - only 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Cheap little pressure washer for washing my car. Update: it is now April so I have had this product for 6-7 months. I have used this product less then 2 dozen times for less than 30 minutes each time and today the pressure washer decided it was going to do what it wants. It pressurized the entire time, even when I was not pulling the trigger. Only way I could get it to stop was turning the switch off or unplugging it from the outlet. Not worth $100 to get about 20 uses out of. Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Worked 3 times then went kaput
customer_reviews.text: At first this was more than expected for an electric power washer. I used it for basement concrete walls and it worked great. I turned it on (exactly as instructions stated) a week later and water pressure was terrible. It would prime up to pressure then lose ALL pressure. I used this a total of 3 times before it went kaput. Exactly one week past the return date. Don't waste your money. Get something a bit more worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I like that all the nozzles and the wand are stored on the power washer. It was easy to put together and easy to use. It did a great job getting my vinyl railings clean. The machine is a little heavy to carry on flat surfaces it wheels around just fine. Unfortunately I have lots of up and down to maneuver it on. I gave 5 star for maneuverability because I feel most won't be hauling it up and down stairs, also with everything stored on the unit you aren't making extra trips.
customer_reviews.author: Janis J Dalton

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: So far this has done the job very well. It's easy to assemble and use. It's compact enough to store nicely in a small space. It seems sturdy and strong, I haven't broken it yet. It's electrical so the good thing is that I used it for almost a full day without having to stop and refill with gas. I did take a star off because during that day, and I'm not sure why, it would lose the pressure every so often and then would need to recharge or repressurize for a few seconds...Also, I didn't quite realize 'till now, I did not get a cleaning solution bottle in the box (so that is another star)...
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice item but mine came with the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice item but mine came with the handle broke in about 4pcs had to return. I'm sure this was just one of those things that sometime happens, I did figure out though I will be getting one with wheels due to having to move it, this one has to be picked up and carried
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Lasted exactly 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product until I went to use it for the first time this season. It began to leak water from the bottom of the unit as soon as I turned it on, and the pressure of the spray was decreased. I checked all of my hose connections and all tight. I surmise that the pump is gone. It broke exactly one year and one month from purchase, so the warranty is now expired. Should last more than one season- correct? I haven't heard from Greenworks yet, so there might be a happy ending to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Babyboomer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU HAVE 3 HOURS OR LESS TO DO
customer_reviews.text: Do not order. I've had to send the first one back after 6 hours of use. After 6 hours the unit starter only pulsating. Well used replacement product today for first time since received and 4 hours in it is doing the same exact thing. Will not prime and only pulsates. I do not even put power to unit until water attached and running so that's not it. Poor quality. And the use of 4 and 6 hours is with breaks in between. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Fairly powerful pressure washer for the money. Slim design is manuverable. It's a little on the heavy side but this actually helps the unit stay upright when unreeling the hose. Only complaint I have is that there was some debris, probably from assembly, inside the internal piping which eventually ended up clogging my turbo nozzle and 40° nozzle. Took awhile to figure why the spray pattern changed all of a sudden but once I blew the trash out of the the nozzles, everything worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little Power Washer !!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned the 1700psi model, but it was stolen. I replaced it with this 1500psi model for car cleaning. The difference is not noticable. Both are consistently powerful without any kind of air turbulence. *Before your first wash, I highly recommend spraying the hose intake screw cap fitting on the washer and/or your water hose with WD-40 or other lubricant for a precise fitting and for easy attachment detachment and to negate water leakage. Attach garden hose to the power washer, turn it on, then turn on the water and wait for 30 seconds to get rid of Air Bubbles. *Don't forget to turn of the water before detachment. Otherwise it's a wet t-shirt contest.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Costanza

customer_reviews.title: Made poorly will not last.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased the hose blew a hole in the first 2 weeks. They sent a replacement. The replacement worked for 4 months and now the unit will not maintain pressure.
customer_reviews.author: FullOLife

customer_reviews.title: Where's the "0" stars option? Totally robbed.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe - JUST MAYBE - these pressure washers work. But I opened the box on mine not 20 minutes ago and I have already filed for a return. There's scuff marks on the front like it's not new and it puts out LESS pressure than the hose does without the washer attached - all the while smelling like it's on fire. Right back in the box. Right back to the manufacturer. I don't appreciate being sent used garbage instead of the item I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Washington

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS after two years!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pressure washer back in Oct 2017 and it's been working without any problems. I primarily use it in a foam cannon setup to wash my cars. It sees use about once every two to three weeks. Today, I was about to wash my car, connected it to the garden hose and water started leaking everywhere. I opened up the unit to investigate and discovered the feeder hose that connects the garden hose to the power unit had bubbled and popped. I have no idea how this happened as the machine does not get much use and even if it did, this should not happen. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby for home use
customer_reviews.text: Kind of lower power, took some time for the unit to charge up the first spraying. had to let it keep recharging itself, after about 5 minutes it started to work properly without loss of pressure. bought to clean slump cones, air pots and other field tools for a geotechnical firm. So far it is ok, but defiantly not a brute sprayer. worked well on employers vehicle to get mud off the undercarriage.. will update as use progresses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great little pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need in a very small package. Used it to pressure wash dried on mud - over 3" thick in some areas, 8 days after sloshing thru the woods in my Jeep. Took it all off nicely. My lady used it to pressure wash our cement walkways for the first time in...20 years? Looks like new. Used it to pressure wash house before painting. I have no motivation to buy a more expensive unit. Was recommended to me by a friend, and I'd recommend it to my friends - small, light, inexpensive - works great.
customer_reviews.author: zakleerite

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Compact, Easy to use, Powerful! I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little machine that packs a lot of power. Assembly was very easy. It's not difficult to use. This was my first time using a pressure washer and I had no difficulties. I would say for a first timer, it can be very messy depending on how dirty of a job your doing, so dress accordingly. You need your own garden hose to attach for water supply and soap, if you decide to use any (I didn't use any). Everything else you need comes in the box. Also, the cord and the pressure hose included are a pretty decent length.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want to pressure you, but go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I’ve become the crazy person on the block searching for things to power wash. It’s great. All my green things are no longer green. My sidewalk looks new. The cords are a bit burdensome when moving around but so is the life of anything electric like vacuuming or mowing or leaf blowing. If you dislike cords, I’d pass but if they don’t phase you too much, this is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Family From Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Unit was not brand new, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived with a few apparent signs of use. One of the legs had been damaged, showing discoloration of the plastic where it had been bent from an impact. The detergent bottle and braided hose line still had moisture and water in them. Other than that, nothing was broken, and the unit worked great. Tested it by cleaning my concrete sidewalk and some bricks on my house.
customer_reviews.author: scroggins5000

customer_reviews.title: Handy little pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is lightweight and easy to carry around. Plan to bring it up a ladder with me soon to wash the roof of our motorhome. Washed my car with it today and was impressed with the way the washer is set up to use pressure washer soap. It has a pressure washer gun spray attachment with screw on soap mixture bottle that can be screwed off and refilled easily as needed. When you're done spraying soap you just remove the soap spraying attachment and reconnect the regular spray wand to wash off the soap and dirt. Pressure level probably not intense enough for certain jobs such as removing deck board mold or old paint. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Received used product
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new pressure washer, and received a used one. So either someone used it one time and sent it back, or it is a terrible product and they returned it. Not cool. Note for next time you want to pass off used for new, take a second to wipe it off first. Now, as far as the product. It is working great. In a time crunch, so I went ahead and used it. Doing a great job on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: chb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Expected
customer_reviews.text: When buying something of this sort, knowing what your'e buying and what to expect is the most important thing. In this case, I bought an inexpensive 1500 PSI Power Washer for cleaning the siding of my house and quickly washing vehicles. It works great for both of these, while being easy to pack away and store. While it may not be as "effective" as higher power versions, it will get the job done, at a good price, and pack away nice when done.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home car wash!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able to wash my car at home and for me, a gas powered one was overkill for what I wanted it for. This has worked flawlessly for that task for months now. I get to wash it at my leisure and how I want it and the pressure is safe enough for your car. The foam gun is awesome too. I take pleasure in washing/waxing/detailing my car and this is a big help in doing that!
customer_reviews.author: Raul Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought years ago
customer_reviews.text: Should have had a pressure washer years ago. So useful. Cleaning car: Obviously, Deck: Yup, but BBQ Grille too, and driveway, and on and on. Great machine, great pressure, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Water pressure not powerful enough!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, just not powerful enough to clean the concrete. You have to put the nozzle nearly an inch off the ground to get it clean, which could take us days and days to clean the backyard concrete if not longer. Just not efficient. When you bring the nozzle further away to get good coverage, the water pressure just isn't powerful enough to clean the dirt out of the concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Received used unit? Decent for money
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, this is certainly not as powerful as a gas powered washer. It does seem to get the job done but may take longer. Pros: Lightweight easy to assemble and transport Quiet, only runs when trigger is pulled Easy for anyone to use, ball bearing connectors for accessories Cons: The foam cannon is absolutely worthless, luckily I owned one already The hose arrived with water in it implying it was used The wand is plastic and will eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M.

customer_reviews.title: Little portable easy to  assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Pros easy to assemble. (looking for your nozzles?) they are in the side of the unit. Took me a minute. Easy to use and not to aggressive. Took the moss and stain off w1 year concrete. Cleaned the Old redwood Deck and didn’t damage it. Will fit in my RV and plan to wash the rv, boats, cars as well. Gonna clean the back deck too. Not expensive and at my age I want easy to use and saves me elbow grease and time. If it breaks down in 6 months I’ll buy another. One negative was plug in would not fir my outside GFIs. Had to use a gfi extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: theresa mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little machine. I was looking for a small one to use since we are low on storage and we are only renting. This is super compact, but works just as hard as a bigger guy. The townhouse we’re renting has never been washed(it’s mold on mold on mold) and this washed it all away. Ran it for three hours straight. Did the whole patio, fence and table and chairs. No issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hakanson

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I use these things for mobile detailing and have yet to have any problems, I get great foam in my foam cannon with them and perfect pressure even with a 50 ft hose. Would recommend getting new attatchments as with any cheaper pressure washer however the machine is terrific. I also recommend quick disconnects and it shortens the amount of time it takes to prime it. Once on it goes and goes. My one complaint would be ramp up time as it doesn’t maintain pressure but you won’t find that on any electric pressure washer sub $1000. Excellent product, excellent value, has help up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Lani Horrocks

customer_reviews.title: Motor smoking after three minutes
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great price, when it did run, it was amazing, and very easy to assemble. Cons: The motor (or whatever electrical inside) was literally smoking and I shut it off to cool down, and it wouldn’t come back on... the first three minutes were amazing. But idk why it over heated so fast and died completely. I got my refund with out having the warranty for it through amazon since I didn’t have it for when a day. Maybe I got the one defective, but I’m not the only one with problems. It could’ve been a 5 star other wise
customer_reviews.author: Ponyboy McGee

customer_reviews.title: For simple cleaning, this unit fills the bill.
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this washer for heavy duty use. I bought it to use on my car, and to do light cleaning work. The unit is easy to set-up and use. In the time that I have owned it, it has performed just as expected. The high pressure discharge hose could be longer,but that would be my only complaint. If you decided to purchase one of these units, just make sure that your garden hose is secured tightly to the machine. If it is just a little bit loose, it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Alan  Grotkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great price/great job!!
customer_reviews.text: The back of my house faces north and I had a lot of green mildew that had to be removed. I found this power washer but wasn’t sure how good it was going to work because the price was so good! After I received it I followed the easy instructions and hooked up everything. I turned the machine on and it just erased all the mildew off the back of my house! It looked like I was painting a fresh coat of paint, it came out so nice. I put before and after pictures up so you can see what a great job it did. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: sue Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT:  CLEANED MILDEW OFF OF THE DECK, WASHED THE CAR
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this pressure washer. It will not bore a hole in concrete as some pressure washers are capable of, but this little thing is great for cleaning mildew off of paint, stripping old cracked paint (if you get up close) AND washing cars. The included plastic foam cannon is pretty much useless. I guess you can dribble soapy water onto your car. So, prepare to buy your own foam cannon if it is important to you. Overall, I am very happy with the this Greenworks Pressure Washer.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny Wings

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large pressure washer that takes a long time to hook up and get running. I use it maybe once a year. I bought this one to wash out my birdbaths and fountains. It is so easy and quick to set up I use it every couple of days! LOVE IT! Works well and easily and is not loud and obnoxious like my large one. I actually washed the back of my house the one day! Built well, folds down nicely and packs up into a compact parcel. Fits into my little garden shed. Liteweight so I can maneuver it easily!
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for two car wash, the pressure washer works really well. It cleans all the bird poop and tree saps off without any issue. One down side is no pressure indicator. I have to touch the water to feel the pressure. Also, the provided water cable is pretty short. It would be much better if it comes with a 20ft long cable for water. Still, for the price , this things works great for car guys and anyone needs to clean their house. Just buy youself a set of nozzle for extra jet options. Will keeps updates if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hanekawa

customer_reviews.title: It sprays water on things and is very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash debris and ugliness off the side of my house. I also use this to wash my car and to lift grime and slime off of my driveway. It works for all these uses. It's as powerful as I need it to be but there are more powerful pressure washers out there. So really whether or not this product works for you depends on what you need it for and what kind of results you want. Personally, this has really worked for me and I'm happy with it. It was a lot cheaper for me to purchase this one vs. renting on daily from a local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: curleegrlee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to clean my driveway and vehicle. The motor is very weak. It’s not strong enough to do much if anything at all. Portability seems like a good thing, but in reality this machine is so cheaply made that it’s not worth buying. I wish I had spent a little more and bought something that actually had some gusto. Wouldn’t recommend and wouldn’t buy again. Coming back to add... I really really really dislike this thing! Not worth it at all!
customer_reviews.author: N. Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Have been very happy with the performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this for one season to clean the outside of a house and to fully clean and refinish a deck. Have been very happy with the performance for the price. Good investment if you have several projects that could use a power-washer vs renting. Will use next summer to finish another deck.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get up and running.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an inexpensive way to do routine outdoor cleaning. Very easy to assemble and operate. A simple one page start up sheet. Worked much better than expected. Did a 20 minute trial run on the driveway and porch using the 25 degree nozzle. Cement looked good as new. Cleaned best holding the tip a couple inches above the surface leaving a 2 inch wide clean row. Can’t speak for durability at this point only have used it once. So far very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN PETERSON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for washing cars but anything tough like cleaning driveways you will want something better
customer_reviews.author: Jroc

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied - right choice for the job
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece of equipment. Purchased this to clean vinyl siding (to get HOA off my back). It was very easy to assemble and up and running in under 5 minutes of unboxing. The vinyl was cleaned up in no time with ample amount of water force. Two nozzles are handy depending on the job. The machine itself is surprisingly not loud. It was so easy and fast, I ended up washing patio chairs, concrete, and two cars - all under 45 minutes. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Suthar

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but I did rely on a lot of other people's research in choosing this power washer so wanted to add my feedback. It proved to be the perfect thing -- affordable price point and did a great job for my husband, who used it on bricks, decking and windows that had been long neglected. He loved that there were two nozzles, which he said made all the difference. Plenty of power for average household needs. The only caveat is that it's still new to us, so at this point we don't know how reliable it will be over time.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: perfect for washing your car!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exclusively for washing my car. I have a gas powered pressure washer but it is 2800 psi. Much too powerful for a car's finish. Also, the gas unit is much too bulky to get out just to wash the car and you cannot leave it running without spraying for very long as it will ruin the pump. This little electric unit is perfect for this type of application. It is extremely mobile, simple to set up and operate, shuts off when you are not spraying and with the addition of a female quick disconnect on the hose, I can use guns from my gas powered unit. I think this little unit is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig T Parker

customer_reviews.title: My first Pressure Washer...
customer_reviews.text: And, I think it's a great buy. Used it so far to clean pool deck and patio. Easy to use and move around. Seems more than powerful enough for my application. Will be used to clean driveway, walkway and eventually house. Only had it a few months so I can't comment on reliability yet.
customer_reviews.author: mysterymeat

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was stronger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pressure washer in hopes that it would help me get the oil stains out of my garage, but it only washed away some of the surface. I tried to clean the fence panels in the backyard like how those before and after videos/pictures show and it didn’t do very well with that either. I read that some people use this for their cars and I feel like that would be the best use of this machine, but I didn’t try it on my own vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: cheeech

customer_reviews.title: Works great for general cleaning
customer_reviews.text: For the size and price of this machine, I am very impressed with the performance. It works great for washing cars... especially caked-on engine grime. It is light, easy to maneuver, and I didn’t have problems with the hose twisting up like some reviewers mentioned. I’ve only had it for a week so I can’t speak to the longevity yet, though i will update if I encounter any issues. However, I purchased the 36 month protection plan for $9.99, so I’m not too worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: driveway and even to clean up garbage cans and gas cans works well very efficient
customer_reviews.text: So I have used this washer for my house, driveway and even to clean up garbage cans and gas cans works well very efficient. I have a large gas powered washer don't think I'll be dragging that one out too often. Big difference in noise level and shuts off the pump when not needed. Nice long cord but to do the house you have to change outlets as you move around but that's to be expected with any electric mobile device. Very light weight easy to haul up the ladder
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Gill

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: This washer works really good when new for light washing. After a 5 or 6 uses the O-ring failed on the pressure side of hose fitting on front. Not a huge deal to replace the O-ring except the fact the cheap brass threads gall up and you can't remove the hose anyways. Wish I could get my money back but the warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P

customer_reviews.title: motor failure
customer_reviews.text: On second use of this product the motor failed. I had the item for over a year before taking it from the box & using it at all, so it was beyond the warranty date. Called Greenworks customer service, was zero help. I'm completely out all of the money spent on this item with nothing to show for it. Couldn't even complete one project. Will not be purchasing Greenworks products in the future as they clearly do not stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Dazy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I used it for over an hour. No leaks whatever from the connections. the nozzles work great (both of them). Easy to set up (I've owned other pressure washers and this one was bullet proof). All connections worked great (no leaks). Can't say enough about this pressure washer. For $84 this was one heck of a buy. All fittings were metal. I've purchased other pressure washers with plastic (and they held up) so I cannot imagine how long this will last. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pico

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Home Power Washer.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up my only problem with it is that you have three hoses and it can get tangled. You have the water hose, then you have the electrical power cord, then you have the hose that then transports the power from the unit to the nossle. All of this can get tangled up, can't move freely, you have to constantly look down at the hoses, then make a move. Maybe make the hose that transfers the water to the nossle retractable???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE - BUY BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Purchased sep 2019, it started to leak from inside the pistol grip in August 2020. Becoming worse and worse I disassembled the grip to find a crack in the plastic apparently from pressure from the pump itself. Contacted company using the warranty form online last week but no response. Appears to be poor materials, light duty in terms of life span and essentially probably a throw-a-way after a year or two of occasional usage. It's got a decent price if you don't need durability but if you can afford it buy something better and, in the long run, save money.
customer_reviews.author: N. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I only needed something for my porch floor (concrete) which has become nasty due the amount of rain we get. Figured this would do the trick and it did. Only thing is the width of the spray is small and I had to hold it close to the surface to really get the grime off, so I was literally clearing one inch strips of floor on every pass. All in all took me 3 hrs. But keep in my mind my porch was exceptionally filthy, so regular washings should be less tedious. Overall did what i needed it to, def a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SuckaMC

customer_reviews.title: My first time :)
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in a few days ago and had to try it right away! Not too sure if it was supposed to come with directions or not but mine didn't (only reason for star reduction). No Biggie, there were directions on Amazon. This thing is pretty small so don't think it's going to provide great amounts of pressure like the bigger ones. For the price & size, it did exactly what I wanted it to. My sidewalk looks so much better now. Look forward to doing way more with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nalani

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought a more powerful unit.
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for washing the car, but don't expect to do your driveway unless you have lots of time to go over it several times. Not enough power for cleaning fences and decks before staining. It did get my car clean. I recommend buying more nozzles to get more spraying options. The two that come with it have many uses, but I bought five more on Amazon and they increase the usability of the washer.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! My wife and I have cleaned our driveway, walkway, cars, the bricks of our house, bbq pit, mud out of boot tread, and softball sand and grass stains out of our daughters uniforms. This thing rocks. Good job GreenWorks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Pressure was poor. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using the Greenworks 1500 psi 13 AMP pressure washer on 7/29/19. Purchased on 6/17/19, last date of return was 7/17/19. Verdict: Pressure was poor. I had better results with my normal garden hose. I do not recommend this to anyone. My fault for waiting so long to get around using it. Terrible product. I would give this zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Worth it the money.  Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and yes the review are true this little power washer is great. We cleaned the whole house, 3 decks, and the garage. I was so shocked. Throw in a few car washes. This thing is great worth every dime we spent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, cheap, and effective
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm. I got this primarily for washing my car, and its well suited for this. Its easy to move around, and after installing quick connects, its basically plug-and-play. On that note, it uses the more common M22 14mm connections which is convenient. I got the TriNova foam cannon to accompany this, and the preinstalled quick connect on the gun is compatible. Four stars because there is room for improvement - but for $89, its a great bargain. Im pretty sure most negative reviews are either defective units, or user error (it has a specific power-on procedure).
customer_reviews.author: K.san

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to use, quiet
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to put together, and I can put together most things with ease. Spray area is only a few inches, but that's an expected trade off for such a small, and electric not gas powered power washer. Live that it's light and easy to use, once it's assembled. This is my second purchase: my 85 year old mother claimed the first one I bought after she borrowed it! Gets the job done if you're not in a hurry and you want a lighter PSI pressure. We both used it on our concrete driveways
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyFine

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I’ve been looking at pressure washers and finally decided on this one for what I’m needing it for. I want to be able to clean my outside entrance way and stairs, sidewalk and patio and this has not disappointed. Once I got it set up, water was coming out of it like a hose so I was very confused. Directions didn’t really show you the two different valves you connect to the end. You select either the green or white one which is on the motor and then snap it on the end of the nozzle. The video provided in the photos of this product really helped me figure that out. Happy pressure washing!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good budget washer for cars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for washing my car with after seeing a YouTube mobile detailer Scott from Dallas Paint using it. Paired it with a 1.1 mm orifice foam cannon from Amazon and it works plenty well enough for my car without me having to worry about too much pressure that it could damage the paint. Been in use now for 4 months with no issues. Since then have also used it to manage to clean our concrete balcony floor with and some vinyl siding which I was surprised. Thought I would need a higher pressure washer but it still got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rob De Leon

customer_reviews.title: BEST LITTLE MACHINE EVERRRR
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is AWESOME SAUCE!!! I live in south Texas where algae forms on the cement in the “winter” as you can see in the picture there was some black crud about the size of a dinner plate and the clean part is where I pressure washed it. After a second pass it was completely clean! I was also able to get up paint droplets from when my house was built 6 years ago. Very awesome! Very easy to use and SUPER POWERFUL! I love it and definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twr27

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carwash and deck cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for cleaning a very dirty deck. First pass: lay down detergent and let soak. Second pass, blast away soap and crud. There is a lower-pressure carwash nozzle and bottle for detergent. My only beef is that it took a lot of research to find cleaning solutions appropriate for each application...I wish the instructions would have been more helpful. Unless you need an industrial-quality high pressure unit, this is more than adequate, and inexpensive, to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schlicher

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cleaning vinyl siding.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to power wash my house siding as it was getting pretty green and gross. Accomplished the mission cleaning the siding pretty well. I had to put the nozzle pretty close to some heavier soiled areas. Decent power for the price and size. Power cord could be longer,I had to use a extension cord to reach some areas around my home. I've only used this once but it worked well. Hopefully it works again when I need it and I get many uses from this power washer.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking 4
customer_reviews.text: Quit small and works great. I've had a chance to start using this more now and I love it and look for jobs to do with it cleaning up old tote bins that I've had outside clean enough to use inside now. I live in North Idaho and we have freezeless faucets so at the very beginning I get a little air I've got to work out but that's not the fault of the machine once that's done good solid power. I have been washing windows brick sidewalks and will use it a lot when I get ready to paint my home. More than happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zzzz

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for cleaning my concrete driveway. In addition to the pressure washer I also purchased the surface cleaning attachment. At least one reviewer mentioned that this could not be used with an extension cord but I found that it will work with a 10 gauge extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little device but too expensive for two time use.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pressure washer the first time I used it! I went to use it a second time and the connection to the hose leaked water everywhere, despite doing the same thing I did the first time. It then stopped working mid-use. It did a great job for the short duration that it worked and I love the size and portability, but paying $90 for something that worked for one use is not something I can recommend. I had to return it and purchase an alternate device to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: L Elmore

customer_reviews.title: DYI Queen
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to recieve this product, I had smal cleanjobs around the house to complete. It worked well at first, the 2nd time it worked and stopped in the middle of my cleaning and would start back working for 2 days. I called the 1800 number and emailed the company, noone replied. I attempted to use it again and it started for 5 mins and stopped and never started back again. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just meTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: A surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always borrowed my dads gas pressure washer and decided it was time to get one of my own- he told me that electric ones didn't have the same power and weren't worth it so I thought I'd save up -BUT deal of the day got me and I'm so glad it did. This seems to perform as well as my dads gas washer for the deck and driveway, is less noisy, and weighs WAY less - I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like 1.2 GPM
customer_reviews.text: I use this solely for washing vehicles in my apartment driveway, and bought to replace a Karcher K1700 that is also rated at 1700 PSI and 1.2 GPM. This washer seems to put out significantly less water, I find myself having to hold the nozzle over areas longer to get the same amount of water. Granted I did buy the 1500 PSI unit and not the 1700, but as it has the same flow rate I didn't think it would make a difference. Still a great unit though, and more portable than the Karcher.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: My first pressure washer and I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest downside is the length of the power cord. I don’t have a big driveway, and it won’t reach to the very end of it. They recommend not using an extension cord but I’m going to have to. Otherwise, I thought it was a little harder than necessary to hook up the hoses. It does a nice job cleaning (if a bit time consuming), is relatively quiet for what it is, and is very light weight. For the price, it’s a good value and has done a good job on my deck, sidewalk and driveway. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good- Worried about overheating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my needs are light and it works like a charm. It's not the most powerful PM in the world, but it meets the expectations of a 1500 psi machine. After an hour of use I was worried it seems to be overheating so i'll amend my review going forward if this is the case. So far, so good. Easy to use, modest power, very portable, easy to store and manage.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my townhome's vinyl siding. It worked well for that purpose, as well as for a couple more things I wasn't even planning... porch, fence, and bathtub/tile. Yes, bathtub and tile. Shut up. I was a little skeptical before ordering, because of the size and because it's electric versus gas. However, I'm happy to report that it packs a punch. I was especially surprised that it had the power to cut through the grime on the porch's concrete. I've used this power washer three times so far, all for periods of more 45 minutes to 1 hour, with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pann

customer_reviews.title: Product came used and did not live up to par
customer_reviews.text: Noticed lube and soap/water residue left inside the tubes. Received a partial refund for this as I thought it would be fine to use. Tried it out same day and definitely just was not living up to par. Did not wash very well and the soap spray was basically just water coming out. Was able to get a refund for this. Definitely going to be searching for something better in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Just used the power washer for the first time yesterday and it works wonderfully! So I must have took after my dad and grandfathers because I tried to put it together and use it without the instructions even though I never used a power washer before it still looked easy enough. Anyways ended up having to review the instructions to find the nozzles. Little hose issue with water leaking out but it could be my hose. Power washer worked great to clean the cement and get off all the green stuff (algae?) growing on the ground after the winter rain. Anyways great power washer, good price. I didn’t even know the cement was a completely different color when it’s clean.
customer_reviews.author: xBbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I bought myself for quarantimes
customer_reviews.text: I have pressure washed *so much stuff* - and it's just small and portable enough for the jobs I want to do without being too much to deal with or operate. I wish there was an attachment system to connect the various pieces to the main unit for storage, or a storage bag that could have come with it? If you need a low pressure unit for a polyvinyl deck, your lawn furniture, power wheels, and small scale house powerwashing? This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Nymh

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer BUT I only use it to get mildew off a TREX deck and the green junk off PVC fencing in the spring. I reas some questions about reaching a sencond floor. It'll reach but the spray will be no more powerful then a regular garden hose. For what I'm doing, its perfect. But if you are looking for heavy use, I'd keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer#9847623

customer_reviews.title: Received two washers and returned them both
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this washer and was disappointed to see the plastic on the gun was broken. I asked for an exchange on the washer but the second washer I received had no pressure at all. Disappointing considering the other reviews I saw
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job power washing our house and driveway. Fairly.easy to move around and with a long garden hose gets pretty good coverage. I am an elderly widow so was pleased I could manage.this on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Decent PW for car cleanings. It provided more than enough clean power, I use it mainly for wheel well cleanings. The included detergent low pressure bottle is meh for me, not enough soap and it uses the mixture in the bottle quickly. I'm looking at some foam cannon options but not a priority for me at this stage. I was impressed for the cost, how much work the PW can do. Later on I'll look at changing the wand since you have to keep holding it for water, I'd prefer to lock it and have it on than to lock it and have it off.
customer_reviews.author: ciscobear

customer_reviews.title: Lite duty power washer
customer_reviews.text: I have a small place, don't need a huge unit, but I wanted one I could clean my decks & siding. This puppy is just the thing. I did buy a better grade of hose, due to some of the reviews that it can break after a few hours of use. Considering the machine is listed at 1500psi, the hose that came with it has written on it MAX PSI @ 1300, I'm glad I did. Works perfectly. I had to run to the H depot to get a larger washer head, but only because it made the job of cleaning the deck faster.
customer_reviews.author: SammnIAmToo

customer_reviews.title: Light weight washer lots of power
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical buying this little guy as I have a 150 pound gas powered model that I lug around. Green works are doing great things and with this pressure washer they have continued to do what they do. Very strong and light weight i can say nothing negative about this washer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this pressure washer to clean the mildew off my siding and patio. I rent my house so I got the cheapest option with good reviews. It worked well, but because it is a lower psi it took much longer to do the whole house than it would have if it was more powerful. Worked great for me, but if I owned a home I would skip this and buy a model with a higher psi rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pressure washer to specifically be used for my deck and siding. I tried to pressure wash my deck with it and I must say that there just isn't quite enough power to do the job. I would not recommend it for a deck. However, it worked fantastic on my vinyl siding on my house. I couldn't be happier. I must have used this little machine for about 4 hours today cleaning my siding, oh and my car while I was at it... lol. Overall it was an easy, convenient and extra fun tool. Recommended for siding and car washing, not the deck.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For Money Product.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pressure washer to complete some patio and deck cleaning in between while i hire professionals for a whole house pressure wash. I have chosen Greenworks based on reviews power and price point. I am completely satisfied with the product. You can see the results from the attached photos and videos
customer_reviews.author: Arun Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my apartment that does not have a water spigot available outside. I purchased an adapter from Lowes that converts your bathroom faucet into a hose connection. I use this thing about once a week (been about 3mo at the time of this writing) and had almost no problems with this thing. Only issue was some water leaking at the hose inlet connection, but I fixed it easily by tightening the connector to the housing. Would recommend for anyone that needs to clean small to medium sized patios or driveways.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zocher

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get much better
customer_reviews.text: This power washer is doing everything I need for a rather affordable price. My wife sometimes has trouble assembling it but I chalk that up to user error. The only complaint my wife has is holding the trigger in the on position for an extended period of time wears out her hand. She uses the velcro for rolling up the cord to keep the trigger pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks is the WORST!
customer_reviews.text: Greenworks is literally the worst company to buy “tools” from! I did not realize this was greenworks until after I ordered. Figured I’d give them a 5th chance. Literally 5 things purchased and 5 things returned. This item, like most of the others, was used and missing parts. Just terrible. Stay away from ANYTHING greenworks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

product_meta.title: Greenworks 2000 PSI 13 Amp 1.2 GPM Pressure Washer with Hose Reel GPW2002
product_meta.description: Style:2000 PSIGreen works offers a wide range of pressure washer cleaning solutions to fit any homeowners needs. The 2000 PSI Pressure Washer features a powerful, quiet 13Amp Induction motor and all of the accessories you need to get the job done right.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty 13 Amp induction motor will strip, brighten and clean your surfaces back to new
25 ft. high pressure hose and 35 ft. power cord allow you to reach a larger
Can be used vertically or horizontally for greater stability
Compact design with wheels, high pressure hose reel and cable holder for easy storage and transportation
25°, 40° nozzle tips, wand and low-pressure foam sprayer included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,400 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
